meanings.definition: Small, dilated blood vessels near the surface of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed out the telangiectasias on the patient's face.
meanings.sent2: Her telangiectasias were more visible in the summer sun.
meanings.sent3: The telangiectasias on his nose made him look like a tiny spider.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were like a map of telangiectasias, crisscrossing in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the delicate telangiectasias with great care and precision.

meanings.sent1: She was self-conscious about her telangiectasias.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist diagnosed her with telangiectasias.
meanings.sent3: His telangiectasias seemed to have a mind of their own, changing color with his mood.
meanings.sent4: The garden was in full bloom, a vibrant display of telangiectasias in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The beauty queen gracefully embraced her telangiectasias, a unique feature that set her apart.
